title: THINK Exercises
introText: THINK helps you pause before responding and consider whether your words and actions are True, Helpful, Inspiring, Necessary, and Kind. These exercises build empathy and compassionate communication skills.

exercises.title: Communicate with THINK
exercises.description: Practice thoughtful communication by considering if your approach is True, Helpful, Inspiring, Necessary, and Kind before engaging with others.

exercises.title: Practice Thoughtful Communication
exercises.description: THINK isn't about being perfectâ€”it's about being intentional. When you pause to consider your words and actions, you create space for more meaningful and compassionate interactions.
